Thoughtful & Purposeful Interior Design

We put design front-and-center — it’s never an afterthought.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interior-design-living-room.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

Great designs. Better service.

Interior design isn’t just something we do. It’s part of who we are and it’s why our design-build and remodeling projects are so successful.

Our interior designers are part of every project from the very beginning. They offer advice and work with not only our architects and contractors, but directly with you as well.

Your interior designer will get to know your likes and dislikes to begin creating the look, style, and feel of your new space. Our designers work closely with the entire design-build team. The process is smooth, seamless, efficient, and most of all fun!

We design it. We build it. You love it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_image=”off” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”|10%||10%|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|auto||15%|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto||auto|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||auto|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Mosaik Design has teamwork down to a fine art. Erin, the designer and Scott the project manager work together and with you the client extremely well. There is a schedule and you can set your watch by it. And the work area is kept neat and clean. Unheard of!

– CHRIS C.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|off” module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|15%||auto|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

After a long search we chose Mosaik to remodel our basement last year. They did a fabulous job. Erin helped make all the design choices very easy. She knew our tastes and was always spot on with her options. Scott was extremely diligent at managing the construction.

– MELINDA B

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Interior-Design-Service-2.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

Design-build and interior design go hand in hand

Some remodelers think of interior design as something that happens after construction is finished. That’s not design-build. Every team — from designers to contractors — works together from the very beginning to make the remodeling project a great experience.

Working together allows us to solve problems before they start and avoid the headaches common to a traditional remodeling process. That’s what makes us a true one-stop shop, managing everything from start to finish, including:

Preparation – Since our designers and builders work in tandem as one team, there’s no confusion and no unexpected delays.

Communication – We talk to each other — and with you — making sure everyone is kept in the loop.

Execution – Our expert contractors work quickly and efficiently to minimize the disruption to your family’s life.

That’s design-build.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ You’ll love working with our interior designers!

Starting at the very beginning of your home remodel or addition, you’ll work closely with an interior designer. You can lean on us for guidance or you can bring your own ideas and vision, allowing us to fill in the gaps and making sure everything seamlessly falls into place. We believe form follows function and will help you select exactly what’s needed to complement your life, including:

  • Colors, materials, and textures
  • Artwork
  • Furnishings
  • Appliances
  • Window coverings
  • Flooring

Let’s make it work!

excerpt.rendered: Thoughtful & Purposeful Interior Design We put design front-and-center — it’s never an afterthought.Great designs. Better service. Interior design isn’t just something we do. It’s part of who we are and it’s why our design-build and remodeling projects are so successful. Our interior designers are part of every project from the very beginning. They offer […]
